Title: Prohibits the use of chemical weapons and kinetic energy munitions on civilian populations
Summary: Requires the division of criminal justice services to establish a policy prohibiting police agencies from using chemical weapons and kinetic energy munitions on civilian populations and from acquiring and stockpiling such weapons or munitions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the division of criminal justice services to establish a policy prohibiting police agencies from using chemical weapons and kinetic energy munitions on civilian populations
